scripts.obfuscate: javascript-obfuscator ./build --output ./release/nodejs --exclude node_modules --dead-code-injection true --debug-protection true --self-defending true --options-preset high-obfuscation --split-strings true --transform-object-keys true
scripts.compile: cd ./build && nexe -b -o ../release/app-win -r . --target windows-x64 && nexe -b -o ../release/app-linux -r . --target linux-x64 && nexe -b -o ../release/app-mac -r . --target mac-x64
scripts.release: rmdir /s /q build && tsc && cd build && copy ..\package.json . && npm install --production && del /q config.js && cd .. && npm run obfuscate && npm run compile && node release.mjs
